phrases: Tomorrow, we will be meeting at school at 7:00 AM,
and head to the rink by bus.
Everyone be sure to be on time.
It will be cold there, so wear warm clothes.
And do not forget your gloves.
I thought it was cold, but this'
Shao Lan, let us hurry home!
Oh, ice is going to be slippery.
I wonder if tomorrow's skating will go alright.
You are great at sports, after all.
Even though it is your first time, I am sure you will get the hang of it quick.
I am still a little worried.
But I am looking forward to it!
Dad made it before he left.
Dad left on a business trip'
Yukito is staying at our house tonight'
Maybe I should make something to eat'
Did not you just finish eating dinner?
He came to study for college entrance exams, did not he?
If he eats too much, he will get sleepy.
Then I will take him some more tea!
I thought I would bring you guys some tea.
I made the tea and everything'
But I did not get to see Yukito.
I am going to get sick!
There is someone with long hair there.
What is with making breakfast so early?
I do not want to skate on a cold day like this'
You will warm up when we get there.
Mei Lin waited until the last minute to decide to come.
so she must not like the cold.
Because Hong Kong is a warm place.
I read it in a book once.
It is close to the equator,
so it has good weather all year long.
You know, you could live there
for a hundred years and never see weather like this.
We will be at the rink shortly.
How do you balance on these skates?
Miss Mizuki is good at this.
Keep your feet about as far apart as your shoulders.
If you keep it slow, you should not fall.
OK, shall we try it out together?
Everyone is trying hard, are not they?
we are heading back in the afternoon.
I would like a hot milk, please.
you want to eat lunch with us over there?
If I take even one step from here,
It is almost a waste to eat it.
Sakura's got the hang of it.
What is going on over here?
Come on out, you will warm up.
Look lively, and get out there!
Actually, it is a bit cold.
By any chance, is the thermostat broken?
Naoko, you look like you are getting sick.
We do not want you to catch a cold,
It is a little cold, but I am comfortable.
It is so cold, Shao Lan!
If you are cold, go inside.
Even if I go inside, it is still cold'
It is a little too cold.
May I have a cup of hot milk?
Can I get a hot coffee?
Is this because of a Clow Card?
You and I probably were not affected
This is the work of the Freeze card.
Never mind that, hurry up and seal the Card!
No matter how much I fight it'
Do you want everyone to stay frozen like this?
while you look for a chance to seal it.
It is swimming in the ice.
That is when it is vulnerable.
Would you take these to everyone?
